Name: CHECKMATE : Battle Arenas
About the game: CHECKMATE : Battle Arenas is turn based real time PvP game with new style. Kill your opponentâ€™s King and get the highest Arena! KEY FEATURES OF THE CHECKMATE Enjoy thrilling moments from turn based 1 vs 1 battle in real time. Create your own deck with 20 skills in each hero and various units. Break blocks in the map and make new strategy on your own. Bring your opponent close to you by breaking the block in the map. But, block direction is changed in each turn so make sure before you use this skill! Checkmate! Shout out your win to the opponent by using unique hero skills and units with your style!
